snippet: The Jets placed quarterback Mark Sanchez on short-term injured reserve, a day after Coach Rex Ryan said he was “doing a great job in rehab.”
abstract: New York Jets place quarterback Mark Sanchez on short-term injured reserve, move that will sideline him for eight weeks, one day after coach Rex Ryan said he was 'doing a great job in rehab.'
lead_paragraph: The Jets placed quarterback Mark Sanchez on short-term injured reserve, a day after Coach Rex Ryan said he was “doing a great job in rehab.”

headline.main: Sanchez Out for 8 Weeks So Shoulder Can Recover
headline.print_headline: Sanchez Out For 8 Weeks So Shoulder Can Recover
